site_title: Silvana’s Star Ball (My Version) By Wilson Lee

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: In this video I will show you how to fold my modified version of the the Silvana's Star Ball unit and show you how to assemble it. Silvana's Star Ball is a model composed of 30 modular units. Yes, it is modular origami. It is also known as a Kusudama Ball. I had some difficulty making a small version of the ball because the units do not want to stay together. This is why I modified the modular unit to have pockets for the connection. The pockets allowed me to make a small version of Silvana's Star Ball without using any glue or paperclips. Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
